data.title: Leading Retailers Turn to Saba to Accelerate Performance and Deliver Superior Customer Experience
data.meta_description: Saba announced that 7 leading global retailers have joined its growing roster of retail customers.
data.text:
REDWOOD SHORES, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Saba (NASDAQ:SABA), the premier People Cloud provider, today announced that seven leading global retailers have joined its growing roster of retail customers. Leveraging Saba People Cloud Applications, retailers can promote brand loyalty, enhance customer experiences and accelerate productivity and sales.

“The retail industry presents a host of unique opportunities when it comes to improving and accelerating productivity and growth. Distributed field organizations and fierce competition, makes managing strategic people processes a demanding task for leadership teams,” said Bobby Yazdani, Founder and CEO, Saba. “The Saba People Cloud enables people within the extended retail organization, such as employees, partners, manufacturers and customers, to leverage the advent of social networking and mobile computing to more easily collaborate, learn and share knowledge. By leveraging people networks, retail organizations can build transformative workplaces that balance operational productivity, brand consistency and talent retention.”

Retailers Reap the Benefits of Saba

Leading retail customers are implementing Saba People Cloud Applications, including learning management, talent management, real-time collaboration and enterprise social networking technologies delivered through the Saba People Cloud, to build a transformative workplace where they can leverage their People Networks to become more competitive through innovation, speed, agility, and trust. New retail customers, include:

ACE Cash Express, Inc.

Apollo-Optik

Best Buy Canada, Ltd

Euronics Italia S.P.A.

Fountain Tire

S.A.C.I. Falabella

Vitamin Shoppe, Inc.

Key Benefits

Using Saba our retail customers can now:

Accelerate on-boarding, improve learning and drive sales through a collaborative, immediate and context-relevant learning environment with video, podcasts, social mentoring and real-time ratings and recommendations

Connect and collaborate with employees to highlight interests and expertise, share and tag relevant content in real-time (such as blogs and video)

Ensure customer loyalty through a consistent and enjoyable brand experience with engaged and knowledgeable team members

Drive better retention and new hire productivity through strong on-boarding

Align headquarters, regional and store management to key organizational goals

Streamline field operations and consolidate systems on a single platform with global flexibility

About Saba

Saba (NASDAQ:SABA) provides a unified set of People Cloud Applications including enterprise learning, talent management, and collaboration solutions delivered through the Saba People Cloud. Today’s people-driven enterprises are using Saba's solutions to mobilize and engage people around new strategies and initiatives, align and connect people to accelerate the flow of business, and cultivate, capture, and share individual and collective knowhow to effectively compete and succeed.
